description:
Kyubei declares that he`s going to take Otae as his wife. Shinpachi is confused by the sudden turn of events, but he remembers Otae`s tears as they separated and charges into the Yagyu mansion with Kondo! Gintoki, Kagura, Hijikata, and Okita come to help. A fierce battle against the Great Four Yagyu and Kyubei begins!!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Feinde von gestern sind auch Feinde von morgen!
Kinou no Teki wa Kyou mo Nanyakanya de Teki
Yesterday`s Enemy Is Also Today`s Enemy
昨日の敵は今日もなんやかんやで敵
